pr_title: Add Shared Scope Support and Support for Multiple Scopes Per Resource

timeline.message: Remove null check as statement.executeQuery never returns null.
Pass scope name to delete global scope.

Remove bindings object from ScopeDTO and add bindings array for roles.
Remove isShared from ScopeDTO and add it as an attribute for the APIDTO.scopes array.
update scope detachment by passing context seperately
relfect isShared field changes in APIDTO
detach resource scope using resourse path
add support for multiple scopes per resource.
fix scope.id null issue when checking equality of two scope objects.
fix issue of not deleting local scopes during API delete if the same scope name is available in a different tenant.
support multiple scopes per resource when legacy scope extenation x-scope (preserveLegacyExtension) is supported.
Return boolean primitive type for isScopeExists()
fix keymanager impl wrapper test class issues.

Remove only unversioned scopes during API update.
Versioned scopes cannot change during API update.
Fix review comment. Revert APIManager API change.

Handle null in connection rollbacks.
Move AddLocalScopes to updateScope transaction.
Move getAPIContext to deleteAPI transaction.
Fix publisher swagger issue of having similar paths /scopes/{scopeId} GET and /scopes/{scopeName} HEAD.
remove unnecessary null checks for resultset. Add notes to methods for removing in future.
handle connection rollback for URItemplate removal in update.
Add KM extension to validate global scopes while attaching them to APIs.
seperate local scope existence validation and registration logic.
Add resource scope attach, detach and update extension points to KM interface.
Seperate KM service calls from ApiMgtDAO layer.

Fix review comments.
1.During API deletion, separately delete the resource scope mappings from API-M before deleting the URI templates.
2. Use the same DB connection when retrieving the API Id during API update and delete.
3. Provide default implementation for attachResourceScopes, deatachResourceScopes, and updateResourceScopes in KeyManager interface.
4. Let updating the local scopes (during API update) which are shared across versioned APIs.
5. Explicitly handle the resource scope operations from default KM implementation to make sure current usecases work.
Move getAPIScopes to APIUtil so that KM call will not be done from DAO layer.
Remove preserveLegacyScope property. Make legacy scope migration mandatory.
Add DisplayName to ScopeDTO in publisher REST API. Keep display name in Scope.name and scope key in Scope.key.
Add TODO for multiple scope per resource support in Basic Auth Gateway.
Fix review comments. Add specific field names to SELECT queries.
Fix get scope id using scope name.
remove tenantId parameter for api update.
add validation for scope display name. When display is not provided, add the scope name as the display name. Refer the same objects in api.scopes to URI templates.

fix tests.
remove unused methods and sql queries.
Fix issues when retrieving shared scopes and searching paginated apis.
Get versioned local scopes and remove them from the old local scope set sending to KM, during API update.
Add resource scope to URITemplate.scopes array.

Fix issue of returning scopes in uri templates for creation new version flow.
Fix graphql oauth token invocation issue.
fix issue when loading scopes for Operations in GraphQL.
remove AM_API_SCOPES table and add shared scope tables for test cases.
remove oauth2 scope resource path primary key constraint.
fix review comment : remove initializeHttpClient from KeyManager Interface. Add it to DefaultImplementation only.
fix bug, remove shared scope by tenantId.
